committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and service of Dr. William Beaumont.

summary.text: Provides for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and service of Doctor William Beaumont, "father of physiology."

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and service of Dr. William Beaumont.
